channel.title: Ok please someone help me get through simple steps for npc drops
channel.description:
ok well so far, i got a npc spawned, a guard. and i put the item i want it to drop like this :
here is my npcdrops:
//--------NPCID---------DropType--------Item----Amount-- npcdrop = 9 1 995 12
--------------------------------------------------------- and i also think i need to add more, but yeah, and i think my source is delta scape.
the guard wont drop the item. and i want to know why, thanks k0 gawd k0.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 29, 2008, 10:16:59 pm[/size][hr]cfg, u mean the npcdrops? and i do, but the npc just wont drop. u sure there is no other file i need to go in to set the % drop or anything?
